lore: Claimed by the Void when she was only a child, Kai'Sa managed to survive through sheer tenacity and strength of will. Her experiences have made her a deadly hunter and, to some, the harbinger of a future they would rather not live to see. Having entered into an uneasy symbiosis with a living Void carapace, the time will soon come when she must decide whether to forgive those mortals who would call her a monster, and defeat the coming darkness togetherâ€¦ or simply to forget, as the Void consumes the world that left her behind.
title: Daughter of the Void
blurb: Claimed by the Void when she was only a child, Kai'Sa managed to survive through sheer tenacity and strength of will. Her experiences have made her a deadly hunter and, to some, the harbinger of a future they would rather not live to see. Having entered...
allytips: Try to catch enemy carries alone to burst them with Icathian Rain.
Work with your teammates to set up your Ultimate and optimize damage with your passive.
Make sure to buy items that will evolve at least 1 or 2 of your spells.

passive.name: Second Skin
passive.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

enemytips: Kai'Sa is very good at picking off isolated enemies. Stick together against her.
Kai'Sa is very vulnerable to getting outranged by mages and long range carries.
Make sure to place wards in your blind spots so you can see Kai'Sa coming.
name: Kai'Sa

spells.name: Icathian Rain
spells.description: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.
spells.tooltip:
Kai'Sa launches {{ e2 }} missiles that split among nearby enemies, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f7 }}) physical damage. Additional hits on a champion or monster deal {{ e3 }}% damage (max: {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f8 }})).

Living Weapon - {{ e6 }} Bonus Attack Damage (current: {{ f5 }}) - Icathian Rain fires {{ e7 }} missiles.

Minions below {{ e5 }}% health take {{ e4 }}% damage.

spells.name: Void Seeker
spells.description: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.
spells.tooltip:
Kai'Sa fires a Void blast that grants True Sight on the first enemy hit, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage, and applies {{ e4 }} stacks of Plasma.

Living Weapon - {{ e2 }} Ability Power (current: {{ f3 }}) - Void Seeker applies {{ e5 }} stacks of Plasma and refunds {{ e3 }}% cooldown on champion hit.

spells.name: Supercharge
spells.description: Kai'Sa briefly increases her movement speed, then increases her attack speed.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kai'Sa briefly increases her movement speed, then increases her attack speed.
spells.tooltip:
Kai'Sa spends {{ f1 }} seconds Supercharging her Void Energy. She gains {{ f4 }}% Movement Speed during the charge, and {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds when charged.

Living Weapon - {{ e6 }}% Attack Speed (current: {{ f2 }}%) - Supercharge grants Invisibility for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Basic attacks reduce Supercharge's cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds. Supercharge's cast time and Movement Speed improve with Attack Speed.

spells.name: Killer Instinct
spells.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip: Kai'Sa warps to a location near an enemy champion affected by Plasma, gaining a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.
